<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set site(s) OpenSearch index settings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/sites/{siteId}/opensearch/index"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the OpenSearch index settings
